member.name: D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_USAGE
member.summary: Describes how a render target is remoted and whether it should be GDI-compatible. This enumeration allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

member.name: D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_USAGE.D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_USAGE_NONE
member.summary: The render target attempts to use Direct3D command-stream remoting and uses bitmap remoting if stream remoting fails. The render target is not GDI-compatible.

member.name: D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_USAGE.D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_USAGE_FORCE_BITMAP_REMOTING
member.summary: The render target renders content locally and sends it to the terminal services client as a bitmap.

member.name: D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_USAGE.D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_USAGE_GDI_COMPATIBLE
member.summary: The render target can be used efficiently with GDI.
